ValidationRule.description: Opportunity Name is Required for Product Specification Record to move the Stage from Define to Design
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( RecordType.DeveloperName ='CCE_Program_Specification', ISCHANGED( Stage__c ), NOT(ISPICKVAL( Stage__c, 'Define')), ISBLANK( Opportunity_Name__c ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: “Opportunity Name” is required to update the Stage
